Name: TalonOracle
Description: Flying caster. Can use Revelation, Stasis Ward, and Pulsar Beam.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Move Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Move Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Scan-moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Acquire Move

Root.Tooltip:
Charges the Starwings Hamonic Disruption and allows it to attack enemy air units.

Drains 1.4 energy per second.
Root.Name: Activate Harmonic Disruptor Missiles

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Charges up for 6 seconds, and then stuns enemy ground units and ground structures in the target area for 10 seconds.
Root.Name: Disruption Field

Root.Tooltip: Deactivates the Starwings Harmonic Disruption disabling it from attacking aerial targets.
Root.Name: Deactivate Harmonic Disruptor Missiles

Root.Tooltip: **Oracle** maximum energy increased by 50 and  starting energy by 25.
Root.Name: Bosonic Core

Root.Tooltip: **Starwing** Disruption Field prepare time decreased by 50%.
Root.Name: Disruption Tethers
